summary: An update of the classic Shakespeare story, director Kenneth Branagh shot the film like a classic 1930s musical. It tells the story of four best friends who swear off love.
cast: Alessandro Nivola|Alicia Silverstone|Natascha McElhone|Kenneth Branagh|Carmen Ejogo|Matthew Lillard|Adrian Lester|Emily Mortimer|Richard Briers|Geraldine McEwan|Stefania Rocca|Jimmy Yuill|Nathan Lane|Timothy Spall|Anthony O'Donnell|Daniel Hill|Richard Clifford|Alfred Bell|Daisy Gough|Graham Hubbard|Paul Moody|Yvonne Riley|Iain Stuart Robertson|Emma Scott|Amy Tez|Nikki Abraham|Colin Barrett|Jonathan Blazer|Catherine Dugdale|Michele Du Verney|Richard Joseph|Trudi Swift|Bryn Walters|Dan Farrell|Tim Packham
title: Trabajos de amor perdidos
